name: Meraki Webhook to Webex Teams Connector
description: Meraki Webhook to Webex Teams Connector

WEBEX_INTEGRATION_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of the Integration that you create in Webex Teams. Create a new Integration at https://developer.webex.com/my-apps/new/integration if you have not already done so.

WEBEX_INTEGRATION_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the Integration that you create in Webex Teams.

WEBEX_BOT_USERNAME.description: The Username of the Bot that you create in Webex Teams. Create a new Bot at https://developer.webex.com/my-apps/new/bot if you have not already done so.

WEBEX_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Token of the Bot that you create in Webex Teams.

BASE_URL.description: The base address of your application. The public address of your Heroku app will be 'https://<App Name>.herokuapp.com/
